About me.text: My Name is Franziska, i am German and I love music.

My 10 favourite Records.title: Miss Machine
My 10 favourite Records.description: Definitely my favorite album from my favorite band.

My 10 favourite Records.title: Symbolic
My 10 favourite Records.description: Death founded the genre. And until today there is no better death metal band.

My 10 favourite Records.title: Fires Within Fires
My 10 favourite Records.description: The band has been around for over 20 years and they just keep getting better. Hearing the album on vinyl is a revelation.

My 10 favourite Records.title: Modern Primitiv
My 10 favourite Records.description: My favourite record of the year. This record is just amazing! The mix of Death Metal and orchestral music just works so well. On this record the two vocalists complement each other. They change between high singing and deep gutturals. The song Neuromancer has a beautiful acoustic guitar intro. It gets played again for the remarkable midpart of the song. I admire the talent of guitarist Christos Antoniou, who studied composition. He arranged all these beautiful orchestral parts.

My 10 favourite Records.title: Reflections Of A Floating World
My 10 favourite Records.description: A Mix of Progressiv and Stoner Rock.

My 10 favourite Records.title: A Maze Of Recycled Creeds
My 10 favourite Records.description: Technical Death Metal from France. The band is a blast live.

My 10 favourite Records.title: The Dusk In Us
My 10 favourite Records.description: This Record is my Jane Doe.

My 10 favourite Records.title: Guidance
My 10 favourite Records.description: Bassist Brian Cook founded the Mathcore genre with Botch. Now he plays Post Rock and I find that even better.
